# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its high-quality features and exceptional performance, it's truly a game-changer in its category. I believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection. For this exceptional piece, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $180. This is a fantastic opportunity to own a product that's worth more than $150, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
